      • logERROR

        public static void logERROR(String log)
        It writes 'log' record to configured 'LOGFILE' adding timestamp and [ERROR] to it, ALWAYS.
        And if the input string has new line characters, then the string will be split and put into different lines.
        Parameters:
        log -
